headline: A Look At AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Valuation After Recent Share Price Movement
summary: Why AvalonBay Communities (AVB) is on investors’ radar AvalonBay Communities (AVB) has drawn attention after recent share performance, with the stock showing a 2.4% move over the past day but negative returns over the past year and year to date. See our latest analysis for AvalonBay Communities. That 2.4% 1 day share price gain to around US$173.83 comes against a weaker backdrop, with a 30 day share price return of 3.1% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 17.9%. This suggests recent...
